entities.description: The frequency count of responses in the survey without any weighting applied.
The specific category or response option for the survey items.
The percentage of respondents who selected a particular response option.
The number of valid responses out of the total cases surveyed.
The average value for the survey item responses.
The minimum value observed in the survey item responses.
The maximum value observed in the survey item responses.
The standard deviation of the responses for the survey item.
The field location details in the dataset, including width and decimal information.
The type of the variable in the dataset, specifying whether it's numeric, categorical, etc.
The UCR (Uniform Crime Reporting) code for counties used in the survey.

relationships.description: Relates a response category to its unweighted frequency count.
Indicates the percentage representation of a specific response category.
Indicates the number of valid cases included in the survey analysis.
Relates a survey item to its descriptive statistics, including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Indicates the location details of the field within the dataset.
Indicates the variable type for a survey item in the dataset.
Associates a respondent with the UCR county code used in the survey.
